name: Dom Pedro Aquamarine
skill: Recovers 1503/1843 HP; increases DMG by 51/63% for a limited time.
ability: Slightly restores HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the biggest aquamarine gem in the world. She values relationships with others a little too much and tends to meddle in other people's business. She tends to act flirty, too, so lots of guys have fallen for her.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" Event: Clear Chapter 2
◦ "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" Event: Exchange for 1000 Pyroxene Shards
◦The cost increases by 100 Pyroxene Shards after each exchange
(1000, 1100, 1200, 1300)
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the drop rate of Pyroxene Shards during the "Jewels and The Secret Workshop" event.

main: "Let's just say I strengthen bonds of all kinds! Including yours, of course!"
summon: "You and I are connected by an invisible bond. That's why I grow stronger!"
limit_break: "I hope this helps me form bonds with many other people in the future..."
